mapper.select: select a.after_sale_id,d.goods_name,c.goods_amount,c.order_id,d.goods_low_price,d.goods_high_price, c.goods_real_price,a.handle_way ,a.handle_person,a.handle_time,a.prove_img,a.after_sale_reason,a.handle_status,b.user_company,f.delivery_time from after_sale a join user b on a.user_id=b.id join order_item c on a.a_order_id=c.order_id join goods d on c.goods_id=d.id join t_order f on c.order_id=f.id where order_id=#{2} limit #{0},#{1}
select count(1) from after_sale where user_id=#{user_id}

select after_sale.after_sale_id,after_sale.a_order_id,user.user_name,t_order.delivery_time,after_sale.after_sale_reason,after_sale.handle_status from after_sale join user on after_sale.user_id=user.user_id join t_order on after_sale.a_order_id=t_order.id where after_sale.user_id=#{2} limit #{0},#{1}

select after_sale.after_sale_id,after_sale.a_order_id,t_order.id,user.user_name,t_order.delivery_time,after_sale.after_sale_reason,after_sale.handle_status from after_sale join user on after_sale.user_id=user.user_id join t_order on after_sale.a_order_id=t_order.id limit #{0},#{1}

select after_sale.after_sale_id,after_sale.a_order_id,t_order.id,user.user_name,t_order.delivery_time,after_sale.after_sale_reason,after_sale.handle_status from after_sale join user on after_sale.user_id=user.user_id join t_order on after_sale.a_order_id=t_order.id where delivery_time=#{2} limit #{0},#{1}
